summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1382, for the improvement of Latona Avenue, from East Forty-fifth Street to East Forty-second Street, in the City of Seattle, by constructing therein sewer of proper dimensions and material, together with all necessary manholes, wyes, openings, catch basins, flush tanks, and other appurtenances, under Ordinance No. 15112 and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
